context: Hi there, how are you? I recently saw Get Out (2017). Have you seen it?
Good morning How was the movie It was cool to me Have you seen the new The Avengers (2012)
Really? I did not see it. I like 90s movies like Can't Hardly Wait. Have you seen that?
Or how about Deadpool 2 (2018) very good movie No never heard of it
resp: I honestly am not big on superhero movies though I am a huge fan of The Dark Knight (2008). :)
